card.name: Sorcha, Queen of Vishtal
card.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have intimidate. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with them.)
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control have deathtouch.

card.name: Exhumer of Histories
card.text: Decay - {T}, Put a depletion counter on Exhumer of Histories: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. Then if the number of depletion counters on Exhumer of Histories is greater than the number of creature cards in all graveyards, sacrifice Exhumer of Histories.

card.name: Demonic Deal
card.text:
Cumulative upkeep {B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

Skip your draw step.
You can't cast more than one spell each turn.
When Demonic Deal leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

When Grinding Vault enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.
{T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If both are nonland cards, add {C} to your mana pool and untap Grinding Vault.

card.name: Guardian of Seasons
card.text:
Guardian of Seasons's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
{2}: Guardian of Seasons becomes the basic land type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn.

card.name: Hallowmoss Den
card.text:
({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)
Hallowmoss Den enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever another Forest enters the battlefield, you may pay {3}{G}. If you do, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Hidden Farmstead
card.text:
Hidden Farmstead enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target Forest, Plains, or Island.

card.name: Hidden Grotto
card.text:
Hidden Grotto enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target Swamp, Mountain, or Forest.

card.name: Hidden Grove
card.text:
Hidden Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target Mountain, Forest or Plains.

card.name: Hidden Morass
card.text:
Hidden Morass enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target Island, Swamp or Mountain.

card.name: Hidden Spring
card.text:
Hidden Spring enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target Plains, Island or Swamp.

card.name: Homeland of All
card.text:
Homeland of All enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Pay 2 life: Choose a basic land type and put a land token of that type onto the battlefield. At the beginning of the next end step, exile that token.

card.name: Shrine of Dawn
card.text:
({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)
Shrine of Dawn enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever another Plains enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{W}. If you do, gain 3 life.

card.name: Undermarsh
card.text:
({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)
Undermarsh enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever another Swamp enters the battlefield you may pay {3}{B}. If you do, put target creature card in your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Village
card.text:
A deck can have any number of cards named Village.
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more Villages, you win the game.

card.name: Weathered Outlook
card.text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
{T}: Add {C} or one mana of any of the top card of your library's colors to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Weathered Outlook: Draw a card.

card.name: Windsculpted Glacier
card.text:
Windsculpted Glacier enters the battlefield tapped.
When Windsculpted Glacier enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{2}{U}{U}: Windsculpted Glacier becomes a copy of the exiled card until end of turn. It's still a land.
